mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin WHERE AD_ID = #{AD_ID} AND AD_PW = #{AD_PW} AND AD_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM user WHERE
US_NAME LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') US_NICK LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') 1 = 1
ORDER BY US_IDX asc
SELECT * FROM admin WHERE RL_NAME != '최고관리자' ORDER BY AD_IDX asc

SELECT RP_IDX , TO_US_ID , FROM_US_ID , c2.value AS RP_CATEGORY , RP_TIME FROM report rp LEFT JOIN common c1 ON rp.RP_STATUS = c1.code LEFT JOIN common c2 ON rp.RP_CATEGORY = c2.code WHERE
c1.code != 'RS01'
AND TO_US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') AND FROM_US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') AND 1 = 1
c1.code = 'RS01'
AND TO_US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') AND FROM_US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') AND 1 = 1
ORDER BY RP_IDX DESC

SELECT CM_IDX , CM_ID , CM_TITLE , CM_NICK , CM_CATEGORY FROM community WHERE
CM_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') CM_NICK LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') CM_TITLE LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') 1 = 1
ORDER BY CM_REG_DATE desc
SELECT CTG_CODE , CTG_NAME , CTG_HIDE , UP_CTG_CODE FROM category WHERE UP_CTG_CODE = #{type};
SELECT * FROM Mcommon
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'APD_STATUS' AND hide = 'N' ORDER BY code asc
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'APD_REJECTION' AND hide = 'N' ORDER BY code asc
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'ROLE_TYPE' AND code != 'ARL01' AND hide = 'Y' ORDER BY code asc
SELECT * FROM category WHERE UP_CTG_CODE = 'T' ORDER BY UP_CTG_CODE asc
SELECT code, value FROM common WHERE name = #{name} AND hide = 'N' ORDER BY code asc;

SELECT * , (SELECT count(RP_STATUS) FROM report r WHERE FROM_US_ID = u.US_ID AND RP_STATUS = 'RS02') AS RP_COUNT , (SELECT count(US_ID) FROM product p WHERE US_ID = u.US_ID) AS PD_COUNT , (SELECT count(CM_ID) FROM community c WHERE CM_ID = u.US_ID) AS CM_COUNT , (SELECT count(APD_OWNER) FROM auction_product ap WHERE APD_OWNER = u.US_ID) AS APD_COUNT FROM `user` u WHERE u.US_ID = #{target};

SELECT rp.RP_IDX , rp.TO_US_ID , rp.FROM_US_ID , c1.value AS RP_STATUS , c2.value AS RP_CATEGORY , rp.RP_CONTENT , rp.RP_TIME , rp.RP_IMG1 , rp.RP_IMG2 FROM report rp LEFT JOIN common c1 ON rp.RP_STATUS = c1.code LEFT JOIN common c2 ON rp.RP_CATEGORY= c2.code WHERE RP_IDX = #{target}

WITH RECURSIVE tmp(CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME, UP_CTG_CODE, path) AS ( SELECT CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME, UP_CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME FROM category WHERE UP_CTG_CODE = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT t.CTG_CODE, t.CTG_NAME, t.UP_CTG_CODE, CONCAT(tp.path, '/', t.CTG_NAME) FROM category t INNER JOIN tmp tp ON t.UP_CTG_CODE = tp.CTG_CODE ) SELECT ap.APD_OWNER , ap.APD_NAME , ap.APD_DETAIL , tmp.PATH AS APD_CATEGORY , c1.value as APD_STATUS , c2.value as APD_REJECTION , ap.APD_REG_DATE , ap.APD_DEADLINE , c3.value as APD_CONDITION , ap.APD_START_PRICE , ap.APD_BUY_NOW_PRICE , img.image1 , img.image2 , img.image3 , img.image4 , img.image5 FROM auction_product ap LEFT JOIN tmp ON ap.APD_CATEGORY = tmp.CTG_CODE LEFT JOIN common c1 ON ap.APD_STATUS = c1.code LEFT JOIN common c2 ON ap.APD_REJECTION = c2.code LEFT JOIN common c3 ON ap.APD_CONDITION = c3.code LEFT JOIN images img ON ap.APD_IMAGE = img.IMG_IDX WHERE ap.APD_IDX = #{target}

WITH RECURSIVE tmp(CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME, UP_CTG_CODE, path) AS ( SELECT CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME, UP_CTG_CODE, CTG_NAME FROM category WHERE UP_CTG_CODE = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT t.CTG_CODE, t.CTG_NAME, t.UP_CTG_CODE, CONCAT(tp.path, '/', t.CTG_NAME) FROM category t INNER JOIN tmp tp ON t.UP_CTG_CODE = tp.CTG_CODE )
SELECT tmp.path as category, count(PD_CATEGORY) as cnt FROM product p LEFT JOIN tmp ON p.PD_CATEGORY = tmp.CTG_CODE GROUP BY tmp.path, PD_CATEGORY
SELECT tmp.path as category, count(APD_CATEGORY) as cnt FROM auction_product apd LEFT JOIN tmp ON apd.APD_CATEGORY = tmp.CTG_CODE GROUP BY tmp.path, APD_CATEGORY
